summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4878 for the improvement of 40th Avenue Southwest, from Fauntleroy Avenue to West Frontenac Street; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 55953, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
